Author: JohnNaguib
Title: How to Register and Prepare for the GitHub Copilot Exam Step-by-Step Guide
EnhancedContent:
If you’re planning to validate your AI-assisted coding skills, the GitHub Copilot Certification Exam is a great way to prove your expertise. This guide walks you through everything — from registration to preparation — so you can approach exam day with confidence.

[https://dellenny.com/how-to-register-and-prepare-for-the-github-copilot-exam-step-by-step-guide/](https://dellenny.com/how-to-register-and-prepare-for-the-github-copilot-exam-step-by-step-guide/)
